statements: SELECT * FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_id, batting_average FROM player_statistics WHERE home_runs > 10;
SELECT player_id, home_runs, RBIs FROM player_statistics WHERE batting_average > 0.300;
SELECT player_id, batting_average, RBIs FROM player_statistics WHERE home_runs < 5;
SELECT player_id, AVG(batting_average) FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(RBIs) > 50;
SELECT player_id, batting_average, home_runs, RBIs FROM player_statistics WHERE home_runs > 10 ORDER BY batting_average DESC;
SELECT player_id, home_runs, RBIs, batting_average FROM player_statistics WHERE RBIs < 50 ORDER BY home_runs ASC, batting_average DESC;
SELECT player_id, batting_average, RBIs, home_runs FROM player_statistics WHERE batting_average > 0.300 ORDER BY RBIs DESC, home_runs ASC;
SELECT home_runs, RBIs, player_id, batting_average FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY home_runs DESC, RBIs ASC;
SELECT batting_average, RBIs, player_id, home_runs FROM player_statistics WHERE batting_average < 0.250 ORDER BY player_id ASC, RBIs DESC;
SELECT player_name, batting_average FROM players WHERE home_runs > 20;
SELECT player_name, RBIs FROM players WHERE batting_average > 0.300;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, city, state FROM teams WHERE city='New York';
SELECT player_name, home_runs, RBIs FROM players WHERE RBIs >= 50 ORDER BY home_runs DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, batting_average FROM players WHERE home_runs > 20 ORDER BY batting_average DESC;
SELECT team_name, city, state FROM teams WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT player_name, home_runs, RBIs FROM players WHERE batting_average > 0.300 ORDER BY RBIs DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) as total_players FROM players JOIN teams ON players.player_id = teams.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_players > 5;
SELECT player_id, name, batting_average FROM players;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_name = 'Yankees';
SELECT player_id, name, home_runs, RBIs FROM players WHERE home_runs >= 20 ORDER BY home_runs DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(team_id) AS total_teams FROM teams GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT game_id, date, opponent, result FROM games WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, name, batting_average FROM players WHERE home_runs > 20 ORDER BY batting_average DESC
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.player_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_players DESC
SELECT player_id, name, AVG(batting_average) AS avg_average FROM players GROUP BY player_id, name HAVING AVG(batting_average) > 0.3
SELECT * FROM games WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND result = 'Win' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT team_name, AVG(players.RBIs) AS avg_RBIs FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.player_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY avg_RBIs DESC
SELECT player_name, batting_average FROM player_stats WHERE home_runs > 10;
SELECT * FROM team WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, home_runs FROM player_stats ORDER BY home_runs DESC;
SELECT team_name, city FROM team WHERE team_id < 5;
SELECT player_name, batting_average, RBIs FROM player_stats WHERE RBIs BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT player_name, batting_average, home_runs, RBIs FROM player_stats WHERE batting_average > 0.3 ORDER BY RBIs DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name, city FROM player_stats JOIN player_team ON player_stats.player_id = player_team.player_id JOIN team ON player_team.team_id = team.team_id;
SELECT MAX(home_runs) AS max_home_runs, AVG(batting_average) AS avg_batting_average FROM player_stats;

SELECT player_name, team_name, city, date FROM player_stats JOIN player_team ON player_stats.player_id = player_team.player_id JOIN team ON player_team.team_id = team.team_id JOIN game ON player_team.player_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player_name, batting_average, home_runs, RBIs FROM player_stats WHERE RBIs > 50 ORDER BY batting_average DESC;
SELECT player_name, batting_average FROM player_stats WHERE home_runs > 10;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM team_stats WHERE win_percentage > 0.5;
SELECT player_name, rbis FROM player_stats WHERE batting_average > 0.3 ORDER BY rbis DESC;
SELECT team_name, wins, win_percentage FROM team_stats WHERE losses < 5 ORDER BY win_percentage DESC;
SELECT player_name, batting_average, rbis FROM player_stats WHERE batting_average > 0.25 AND rbis > 50 ORDER BY rbis DESC, batting_average ASC;
SELECT player_name, batting_average FROM player_stats WHERE rbis > 50 ORDER BY batting_average DESC
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM team_stats WHERE win_percentage >= 0.6 ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT player_name, home_runs, rbis FROM player_stats WHERE batting_average > 0.3 ORDER BY home_runs DESC
SELECT * FROM game_stats WHERE opponent_name = 'Yankees' AND result = 'Win' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT player_name, team_name, award_name, year FROM player_stats JOIN awards ON player_stats.player_id = awards.player_id
